dotnetType.name: DecimalDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" /> and attempts to
            map it to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new decimal deserializer builder case.

returns.summary: A function that accepts a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns a deserialized object.

overloads.summary: Builds a decimal deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

returns.summary:
Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.BytesSchema" /> or a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> with
            logical type <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary: Always true; this case will apply but fail if no conversion exists from <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DecimalDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
